list_definition.definition: a round (usually wooden) container for keeping water, washing clothes etc

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He was sitting in the tub.

list_definition.mean_english: lớp bọc ngoài cho que kem
list_definition.definition: a small round container for ice-cream etc

list_ex_of_english: The method consists, briefly, in the liberation of pupae in tubs or large tins in the field.
These were attached to the tube by means of a plastic tub pushed over the lid.
The contents of the tub were analysed under a stereomicroscope, counting seeds of all recognizable species.
The definition of z tub is as follows.
Aphids were collected from the bagged plants by dipping and shaking the plants in a tub of hot water.
The dog was brushed again in the collection tub after traversing 5 m, 120 m, 240 m and 600 m on a road without contact with vegetation.
After 24 h exposure the survivors were removed from the tubs, placed in rearing bowls and reared up to adults.
A hole was cut to allow the tube to be pushed through the bottom of the tub and against the lid of the jar.
